name: AgentKit
description: VS Code extension providing a visual interface to install and manage 42+ pre-built AI agents for Cursor, Claude Code, GitHub Copilot, and Aider. Streamlines AI-assisted development workflows with point-and-click agent selection across 7 specialized departments.
bullets: Built visual GUI with 3-step workflow for selecting AI tools, departments, and specific agents
Integrated 42 pre-built agents across 7 departments (Engineering, Design, Marketing, Product, PM, Operations, Testing)
Implemented 6 quick setup presets (Full Stack, Rapid Prototyper, Design-First, Growth-Focused, Enterprise Team)
Created dual-panel sidebar showing installed agents and available agents with real-time updates
Designed with SOLID principles and modular architecture - clean separation of services, providers, and commands
Published to both VS Code Marketplace and Open VSX Registry with MIT license

name: SecretShield
description: VS Code extension that automatically detects and redacts secrets (API keys, tokens, credentials) before copying code to AI chats. Privacy-focused security tool using regex patterns - no AI, no data collection, all processing happens locally.
bullets: Automatically detects 10+ secret types (OpenAI, GitHub, Stripe, AWS, JWT, private keys, database URLs)
4 redaction styles: partial masking, full replacement, placeholders, or type-labeled
3 sensitivity levels with configurable allowlist/denylist using wildcard patterns
Overrides Cmd+C with silent operation by default - optional diff preview and confirmation
Built with SOLID principles and clean architecture - all files under 150 lines
Published to both VS Code Marketplace and Open VSX Registry with MIT license

name: PromptCopy
description: VS Code extension that automatically adds file paths as comments when copying code. Built specifically for AI engineering workflows with Claude, ChatGPT, and other LLMs to maintain context during development.
bullets: Overrides default Cmd+C to seamlessly add file context without learning new shortcuts
Smart comment detection for 40+ programming languages (TypeScript, Python, Rust, etc.)
Fully configurable with path formats (relative/absolute/filename), line numbers, and custom prefixes
Built with SOLID principles and clean architecture - all files under 100 lines
Published to both VS Code Marketplace and Open VSX Registry
Open source with MIT license for community contributions and customization

name: TOON Toolkit
description: VS Code extension for Token-Oriented Object Notation with tooling for multi-format conversion (JSON, YAML, XML to TOON), validation, and formatting. Perfect for LLM workflows and structured data management.
bullets: Built fast editor workflow with format conversion, linting, and live preview for TOON files
Designed reusable parsers supporting JSON, YAML, and XML conversion to TOON format
Published to both VS Code Marketplace and Open VSX Registry
Optimized developer UX with quick actions, commands, and real-time status feedback

name: Dev Blog
description: Personal developer blog with AI-powered content generation. Built with Astro for optimal SEO, featuring automated article creation using OpenAI for trending tech topics and tutorials.
bullets: Automated content pipeline generating articles on trending topics and technical tutorials
GitHub Actions workflow using OpenAI API for article generation with code snippets and diagrams
Migrated from React/Vite to Astro for superior SEO performance and faster page loads
Friendly, approachable tone while maintaining technical accuracy
Zero-cost hosting on Vercel with automatic deployments

name: Diabeticontrol
description: Healthcare application using artificial intelligence to help diabetic patients track glucose levels, medication schedules, diet, and other health metrics with predictive analytics.
bullets: Developed AI-powered health tracking system for comprehensive diabetes management
Built real-time glucose monitoring with trend analysis and alerts
Implemented medication reminders and dietary tracking with nutritional insights
Created personalized health recommendations based on patient data patterns
Designed mobile-first interface for easy daily use by patients

name: Personal Portfolio
description: Modern, responsive portfolio website showcasing projects, experience, and technical skills. Built with Next.js and deployed on Vercel with custom animations and dark mode support.
bullets: Designed and developed complete portfolio from scratch using Next.js and React
Implemented smooth animations and transitions for enhanced user experience
Built responsive layouts supporting mobile, tablet, and desktop views
Added dark mode with system preference detection
Optimized for performance and SEO with server-side rendering

name: O.L.G.U.I.T.A.
description: AI-powered chatbot developed at Harvard University to identify mental health disorders like anxiety and depression in university students to reduce dropout rates and improve student well-being. Awarded by LASPAU (Harvard affiliate).
bullets: Created conversational AI system detecting mental health issues in students
Built natural language processing pipeline for Spanish and English conversations
Designed early warning system alerting counselors to at-risk students
Implemented privacy-preserving data collection complying with health regulations
Awarded recognition from LASPAU for innovation in student mental health
Part of 'Leaders for the 21st Century' program at Harvard University
